ref.mixed-citation: van Beek RD, van den Heuvel-Eibrink MM, Laven JSE, de Jong FH, Themmen APN, Hakvoort-Cammel FG, van den Bos C, van den Berg H, Pieters R, de Muinck Keizer-Schrama SM. Anti-Müllerian hormone is a sensitive serum marker for gonadal function in women treated for Hodgkin's lymphoma during childhood. J Clini Endocrinol Metabol. 2007;92(10):3869–74.
